ImyaTweaks.Title: Features of Hacienda Overhaul: Extendend Hacienda
ImyaTweaks.Description: Adjust the features of the module, concerning values of the newly added buildings 'Hacienda Guildhouse' and 'Hacienda Townhaul'.

ImyaExpose.Description: This value sets the raidus of the Hacienda Guild House [in tiles]
These values set the amount and type of workforce which is used as maintanence for the Hacienda Guild House [0 - None, 1010366 - Jornaleros, 1010367 - Obreros, 5406 - Artistas]

Standard.Name: Hacienda Construction Menu Ornaments Border Wall
Hacienda Extra Buildings Lordys Creative Mode

ImyaExpose.Description: This value sets the raidus of the Hacienda Guild House [in tiles]
These values set the amount and type of workforce which is used as maintanence for the Hacienda Guild House [0 - None, 1010366 - Jornaleros, 1010367 - Obreros, 5406 - Artistas]

Standard.Name: Trigger Unlock Advanced Hacienda Police Station
Trigger Unlock Advanced Hacienda Fire Station
